name: Hologram Escaper (Beta)
description:
You are trapped in these rooms, how do you get out?

In this game, you play as a futuristic "robot", trapped in these escape rooms

This game is in a beta stage, so more updates will be released as time goes!
-DONT DONATE YET-
QnA-

Q- How do i play?
A- Arrow keys to move, space to jump

Q- I got softlocked
A- just dont be :D

Q- I have a mac, can i download the game from there?
A- Sorry, there isnt a mac build for this game yet
